description.markdown.stripHeaderMarkers: Strip hash markers from markdown headings.
description.c.combineUnnamedStructAndTyp: Merge consecutive typedef and unnamed struct/enum in C.
description.debugMode: Enable debugging features. This is intended for use by the author during development of this extension, please do not use it.
description.debug.showSymbolKindName: Show symbol kind name instead of icon.
description.symbolFilters: Specify filters for symbols to hide. `enableSymbolFilters` must be enabled.
description.symbolFilters.documentPatter: Glob pattern for file names to apply this filter list. Ex: **/*.ts
description.symbolFilters.filters: List of glob pattern filters matching symbols to hide. Ex: ["**/Function/Variable", "**/Constructor/Variable", "**/Method/Variable"]
description.symbolCaptionFormatter: Replacement rule settings for formatting symbol names in the outline view to improve readability. `enableSymbolCaptionFormat` must be enabled.
description.symbolCaptionFormatter.langu: Language IDs to apply this replacement rule list.
description.symbolCaptionFormatter.forma: List of replacement rules. The first rule that matches the symbol kind will be applied.
The name of the symbol kind(s) to apply this replacement. Ex: Function, Variable, Method, Constructor, Interface, Class, Enum, etc. At least one symbol kind must be specified.
Regular expression pattern to search for.
Replacement string. Regular expression capture groups can be used.
description.fetchSymbolHoverText: Specifies where to display the hover text.
description.fetchSymbolHoverText.descrip: Display in the description area. (right of the item)
description.fetchSymbolHoverText.detail: Display in the detail area. (below the item)
description.fetchHoverTextLanguageIdBlac: List of language IDs for which hover text will not be fetched. Ex: `["json", "jsonc"]`
description.hoverTextIndentSpaces: Number of spaces to insert on the left when displaying hover text in the detail area.
description.maxOutlineIndent: Maximum depth of symbols to display in the outline. Set to 0 to show all levels, 1 to show top-level only.
